title: Packsize's X5 Erected Box System Named Finalist for 2023 MHI Innovation Award - Packaging Strategies
summary: Packsize® has introduced its new X5® solution, a fully-automated box system that is a finalist for the 2023 MHI Innovation Award. The X5 machine enhances packaging efficiency in the e-commerce industry by producing right-sized boxes at a speed of up to 600 boxes per hour, significantly reducing waste and shipping emissions. It addresses challenges related to labor shortages and costs while supporting sustainability goals. Packsize aims to minimize environmental impact and improve logistics through its innovative packaging solutions.
green_innovation: TRUE - The X5 solution reduces packaging waste and shipping emissions by producing right-sized boxes, aligning with environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE - The X5 solution is an improved business process that significantly differs from previous packaging methods, enhancing efficiency and reducing costs.
green_product: TRUE - The X5 solution is a green product as it is designed to minimize environmental impact throughout its life cycle by promoting right-sized packaging.
green_process: TRUE - The X5 process minimizes environmental impacts by automating the right-sizing of boxes, thus reducing waste and resource consumption.
